articleContent:
In Jinzhou, you come across a man who appears to be distressed. He claims to have survived a mysterious attack…
Help the designer in resolving the strange anomalies surfacing in the Second Coming of Solaris, and uncover the culprit behind it all.

✦Duration✦
2025-09-17 04:00 - 2025-10-06 03:59 (server time)

✦Rewards✦
Astrite x400, Premium Resonance Potion x6, Premium Energy Core x6, Premium Sealed Tube x9, Forgery Advanced Supply x12, Advanced Enclosure Tank x18, Shell Credit x210000, and other Materials.

✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 14.

✦Event Details✦
- Certain anomalies can be found in the game scenes. After locating these anomalies, use the Utility: Zoom Camera to capture them, then work with Bertolt to modify them.
- You may choose to restore anomalies to their normal state or intentionally distort them further.
